```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
#library(mapview)
#mapviewOptions(fgb = FALSE)
#library(sf)
library(knitr)
library(Kendall)
library(zoo)
library(gridExtra)
library(readr)
```

```{r}

# Read to CSV 
data <- read.csv("../FogMonitoring/raw_data/CR800Series_FogTable_SpicyBunker.dat", skip = 1, stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
#Take out the firs two rows
spicyraw<- data[-c(1,2), ]
#set timestamp as date
str(spicyraw)
spicyraw$TIMESTAMP<- as.POSIXct(spicyraw$TIMESTAMP, tz="", format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")

summary(spicyraw)
```

```{r}
batteryplot<- ggplot(spicyraw, aes(x=TIMESTAMP, y=BattV_Avg))+
  geom_point()+scale_x_date(date_labels = ("%m-%d"))
batteryplot

lwsinitial<- ggplot(spicyraw, aes(x=TIMESTAMP, y= LWmV_17ft_Avg))+
  geom_point()
lwsinitial
```
